verbose_text: An acute bout of exercise or stimulated skeletal muscle contraction induces an increase in both PGC-1alpha mRNA and protein in skeletal muscle [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], and it has been shown that increased PGC-1alpha activation and total protein amount leads to increased mitochondrial biogenesis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: PGC-1alpha activation and total protein amount leads to increased mitochondrial biogenesis
